contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.qandaqu.QAndAQuestionPageContent:
I see that in the future we will have access to [Azure Key Vault for SaaS](https://roadmap.kentico.com/c/240-enable-saas-customers-to-add-sensitive-values-to-key-vault), to have sensitive variable values per environment which is great.
However, what is the recommended approach **today**? Does each SaaS environment (QA, UAT, and PROD) have an appropriate `ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT` set, so we can have appsettings per environment? e.g. `appsettings.{environment}.json`
